channel.title: Compile & Run client question
channel.description: Is there any way I can make it so the person does NOT need java to hit the run button?

item.title: Compile & Run client question
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

You could do what runescape does; put the java files inside the client itself, i think thats what they do… because you dont need java… but then again they use an installer, and i think the files go somewere in the c drive, but yeah, try putting java exes used to run java in the client, and modify your run batch to match the directory, though it may vary, so i dont know exactly how this would work, but most people who play have java, so not much to worry about…

Read full topic
